title: Счастье есть
overview: 40-years-old Svetlana is trying to escape from her problems moving into a small town. Suddenly she finds out she is pregnant from a married man, who is not fond of the news. Svetlana's adult daughter is also not happy to learn such a news, since she has started arranging her personal life. A new happy and a new love is now waiting for Svetlana.
